title: The Writer's Almanac for Saturday, March 12, 2022
description: "Poetry calls us to pause. There is so much we overlook, while the abundance around us continues to shimmer, on its own." -- Naomi Shihab Nye, celebrating 70 years of life today.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: "Poetry calls us to pause. There is so much we overlook, while the abundance around us continues to shimmer, on its own." -- Naomi Shihab Nye, celebrating 70 years of life today.
